data.name: CreateDashboardStagingPriority35
ReadCaseAssignmentServiceProvider
data.value: select T1.REASON_CODE, T1.EFFECTIVE_DATE, T1.DISCONTINUE_DATE, T1.CREATED_TIMESTAMP, T1.SPD_ID, T1.OFF_ID, T1.OSP_CODE, T1.OSP_DATE, T1.CAS_NO, T2.SERVICE_PRVDER_ID, T2.USER_ID, T2.ROLE_CODE from CKT_SERVICE_PRVDER T2 join CKT_ASSIGN_CASE T1 on @casNo = T1.CAS_NO and T1.REASON_CODE = 'RSP' and T1.EFFECTIVE_DATE <= @effectiveDate and T1.DISCONTINUE_DATE >= @effectiveDate and T2.SERVICE_PRVDER_ID = T1.SPD_ID order by T1.EFFECTIVE_DATE desc

data.name: ReadCsePerson
data.value: select T1.NUMB from CKT_CSE_PERSON T1 where exists ( select * from CKT_LEGAL_ACT_PERS T2 where T1.NUMB = T2.CSP_NUMBER and T2.ACCOUNT_TYPE = 'S' and @ladRNumber = T2.LAD_R_NUMBER and @lgaRIdentifier = T2.LGA_R_IDENTIFIER and T2.END_DT > @endDt )

data.name: ReadCsePersonCase
data.value: select * from ( select T1.NUMB from CKT_CSE_PERSON T1 where exists ( select * from CKT_LEGAL_ACT_PERS T2 where T1.NUMB = T2.CSP_NUMBER and T2.ACCOUNT_TYPE = 'R' and @ladRNumber = T2.LAD_R_NUMBER and @lgaRIdentifier = T2.LGA_R_IDENTIFIER ) ) S1 cross apply ( select top(1) T1.NUMB, T1.STATUS, T1.STATUS_DATE, T1.CSE_OPEN_DATE, T1.CREATED_TIMESTAMP, T1.INTERSTATE_CASE_ID, T1.NO_JURISDICTION_CD from CKT_CASE T1 where exists ( select * from CKT_CASE_ROLE T2 where T1.NUMB = T2.CAS_NUMBER and T2.TYPE = 'CH' and T2.START_DATE <= @startDate and T2.END_DATE >= @startDate and @cspNumber = T2.CSP_NUMBER ) and exists ( select * from CKT_CASE_ROLE T3 where T1.NUMB = T3.CAS_NUMBER and T3.TYPE = 'AP' and T3.START_DATE <= @startDate and T3.END_DATE >= @startDate and S1.NUMB = T3.CSP_NUMBER ) order by T1.NUMB desc ) S2

data.name: ReadDashboardStagingPriority1
data.value: select REPORT_MONTH, REPORT_LEVEL, REPORT_LEVEL_ID, AS_OF_DATE, PATERNITIES_EST from CKT_DB_STAGE_PRI35 with(xlock) where REPORT_MONTH = @reportMonth and (REPORT_LEVEL in ('AT', 'CA', 'CW'))

data.name: ReadDashboardStagingPriority2
data.value: select REPORT_MONTH, REPORT_LEVEL, REPORT_LEVEL_ID, AS_OF_DATE, PATERNITIES_EST from CKT_DB_STAGE_PRI35 with(xlock) where REPORT_MONTH = @reportMonth and REPORT_LEVEL = @reportLevel and REPORT_LEVEL_ID = @reportLevelId

data.name: ReadLegalActionAssigmentServiceProvider
data.value: select T1.LGA_IDENTIFIER, T1.OSP_EFFECTIVE_DATE, T1.OSP_ROLE_CODE, T1.OFF_GENERATED_ID, T1.SPD_GENERATED_ID, T1.EFFECTIVE_DT, T1.END_DT, T1.REASON_CODE, T1.CREATED_TIMESTAMP, T2.SERVICE_PRVDER_ID, T2.USER_ID, T2.ROLE_CODE from CKT_SERVICE_PRVDER T2 join CKT_LA_SERV_PROV T1 on @lgaIdentifier = T1.LGA_IDENTIFIER and T1.EFFECTIVE_DT <= @effectiveDt and T1.END_DT >= @effectiveDt and T1.OSP_ROLE_CODE is not null and T1.OSP_EFFECTIVE_DATE is not null and T1.OFF_GENERATED_ID is not null and T2.SERVICE_PRVDER_ID = T1.SPD_GENERATED_ID order by T1.EFFECTIVE_DT desc

data.name: ReadLegalActionLaDetNonfinancialFipsTribunal
data.value: select * from ( select T1.LEGAL_ACTION_ID, T1.CLASSIFICATION, T1.ACTION_TAKEN, T1.TYPE, T1.FILED_DT, T1.COURT_CASE_NO, T1.END_DT, T1.STANDARD_NO, T1.CREATED_TSTAMP, T1.ESTABLISHMENT_CD, T1.TRB_ID, T2.LA_DETAIL_NO, T2.NON_FIN_OBLG_TYPE, T2.DETAIL_TYPE from CKT_LEGAL_ACTION T1 join CKT_LEGAL_ACT_DTL T2 on (T1.FILED_DT between cast(@date1 as date) and cast(@date2 as date)) and T1.STANDARD_NO > @standardNo and (T1.ESTABLISHMENT_CD in ('CS', 'CT')) and T1.CLASSIFICATION = 'J' and T1.LEGAL_ACTION_ID = T2.LGA_IDENTIFIER and T2.NON_FIN_OBLG_TYPE = 'EP' and T2.DETAIL_TYPE = 'N' ) S1 cross apply ( select top(1) T1.[STATE], T1.COUNTY, T1.LOCATION, T1.COUNTY_DESC, T1.STATE_ABBREVIATION, T2.TRIBUNAL_NM, T2.JUDICIAL_DISTRICT, T2.IDENTIFIER from CKT_FIPS T1 join CKT_TRIBUNAL T2 on T2.IDENTIFIER = S1.TRB_ID and T1.LOCATION = T2.FIP_LOCATION and T1.COUNTY = T2.FIP_COUNTY and T1.[STATE] = T2.FIP_STATE and T1.COUNTY > 0 ) S2 order by S1.STANDARD_NO, S1.FILED_DT

data.name: UpdateDashboardStagingPriority1
data.value: update CKT_DB_STAGE_PRI35 set PATERNITIES_EST = @paternitiesEst where REPORT_MONTH = @reportMonth and REPORT_LEVEL = @reportLevel and REPORT_LEVEL_ID = @reportLevelId

data.name: UpdateDashboardStagingPriority2
data.value: update CKT_DB_STAGE_PRI35 set AS_OF_DATE = @asOfDate, PATERNITIES_EST = @paternitiesEst where REPORT_MONTH = @reportMonth and REPORT_LEVEL = @reportLevel and REPORT_LEVEL_ID = @reportLevelId
